column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The bacon and dates thing was great
column2: and I don't usually like bacon. Goat cheese and tomato sauce bread was good
column3: as was the octopus (but I think Ibericho's octopus is superior
column4: even though Ba-Ba-Reeba is better overall). The only thing I didn't like was the chicken paella. The last time I had paella was in Costa Rica and it was divine. This one tasted burnt
column5: but not in a good way. The chicken was on the dry side
column6: so I knocked off a star for that.
